This category contains articles related to Custom Fields.
A 
Custom Field
 is the basic unit of data storage that you attach to an object such as a 
contact
, a 
role
, an activity type or company.
Overview
Many areas in SmartSimple are comprised primarily of custom fields—such as the —so understanding their proper setup and use is vital in order to create an easy-to-use instance that addresses your organization's needs. There are over 50 field types that you can use to capture and store data; these can be grouped on tabs, or displayed in multiple columns to avoid cluttering the page. The maximum number of custom fields that can be displayed on a single page is 400 total. New fields can be created at any time, without affecting current data.

Types of Custom Fields
There are many types of custom fields, each designed for a specific purpose. It's a good idea to familiarize yourself with them to gain a better understanding of what they do. We've compiled a list of every type; feel free to click through and learn how they work.
Note
: the more complex field types will not display in the list when creating a new custom field, unless Advanced Options is first toggled on in the upper right of the field setup screen.

Custom Field Type: Lookup – ICD Code
Special Input
Displays a list of the standard ICD Codes (International Statistical Classification of Diseases and Related Health Problems).
Custom Field Type: Lookup – MeSH Codes
Special Input
Display a list of MeSH codes (Medical Subject Headings). The Medical Subject Headings (MeSH) thesaurus is a controlled and hierarchically-organized vocabulary produced by the National Library of Medicine.
Custom Field Type: Lookup – NACE Codes
Special Input
Display a list of NACE codes (Nomenclature of Economic Activities).
Custom Field Type: Lookup – NAIC Codes
Special Input
Display a list of NAIC codes (North American Industry Classification System).
Select One - Dynamic Dropdown List
Special Input
Create sets of fields that are dependent on a value selected from the Dynamic Dropdown List.
Select One - Dynamic Radio Buttons
Special Input
Create sets of fields that are dependent on a value selected from the Dynamic Radio Buttons.
Custom Field Type: Special - Advanced Data Table
Special Input
Create a larger worksheet or table, that opens in its own window. Formatted using XML by default.
Custom Field Type: Special - Basic Data Table
Special Input
Create a basic table in-line on the page.
Custom Field Type: Special - Geo Mapping
Special Input

Custom Field Type: Special – Hand Drawing
Special Input

Custom Field Type: Special - Like Button Rating
Special Input

Custom Field Type: Special - Linked Record List
Special Input
Display a list of linked records inline on the page.
Custom Field Type: Special - Question Set Builder
Special Input
Allows users to create their own customized field sets without being an administrator.
Custom Field Type: Special - Rich Text
Special Input
A text box that uses an HTML Editor for additional formatting. This field type should be used sparingly to prevent security risks.
Custom Field Type: Display - Countdown Timer
Display Control
Creates a countdown timer display, with multiple styling templates available. Select from an active 
Custom Field Type: Text Box - Date
 or 
Custom Field Type: Text Box - Date and Time
 field, and the timer will automatically display the amount of time remaining before the selected date and time on the record. 
Custom Field Type: Display - Instructions
Display Control
Creates a static text box, in which to display instructions to users.
Custom_Field_Type:_Display_-_Text
Display Control
A read-only version of another field.
Custom_Field_Type:_Display_-_Text_and_Variables
Display Control
A read-only field that can display text, HTML, variables, and expressions.
Custom Field Type: Layout - Tabbed Section
Display Control
Create a section with tabs.
Custom Field Type: Layout - Title Bar
Display Control
Displays a title bar, to help arrange your data.
Custom Field Type: Special – Browser Script
Special Control
Create a JavaScript function, to be run on the page where it is located.
Custom Field Type: Special – Chart
Special Control
Create a chart to display on your record. Chart options include: Bar, Horizontal Bar, Line, and Area charts.
Custom Field Type: Special – Consumer Creation Button Container
Special Control
Display a Consumer Creation Button on a record, allowing you to create new records from the Provider UTA, without navigating to another UTA.
Custom Field Type: Special – MS Word Merge
Special Control
Create an MS Word document, using SmartSimple data.
Custom Field Type: Special - Web Page View
Special Control
Allows you to create a virtual document using SmartSimple data. The document can also be converted to PDF and downloaded, if so configured.
Display - External Organization Details
Classic

 Lookup - External Organization

Custom Field Type: Lookup – External Organization

Custom Field Type: Lookup – External People
Classic
Lookup and store the names of external people.
Custom Field Type: Lookup - Organization and People
Classic
Look up both internal and external organization names and people. Data is read-only.
Custom Field Type: Select One - Internal Organization Dropdown List
Classic
Look up internal entities and store the name.
Custom Field Type: Select One - Internal People Dropdown List
Classic
Look up an internal person and store a single name. Data is read-only.
Select One - Ledger Code Dropdown List

Custom Field Type: Special - Address Lookup
Classic

Custom Field Type: Special – Auto Save
Classic

Custom Field Type: Special – Barcode
Classic
Converts another field's value to a bar code image.
Custom Field Type: Special – ePad Signature
Classic
Captures and stores a written signature. (used in conjunction with a signature pad).
Custom Field Type: Upload - Single File Storage
Classic
Stores a single file to a field.
